title: Update application name to TestAut in header

requirements.text: Update the application name displayed in the header navigation to 'TestAut'. The change should apply to the link element and span element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/a[1] and /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/a[1]/span[1], which correspond to the logo/brand name in the Layout component.
acceptanceCriteria: The header displays 'TestAut' as the application name
The change is visible on all pages that use the Layout component
The link and text styling remain consistent with the existing design

constraints: Only modify the selected header elements (logo/brand name area)
Preserve existing header styling and layout
Do not change other UI elements or navigation items
nonGoals: Updating the application name in other locations beyond the header
Changing the logo image or icon
Modifying navigation menu items or footer content
Updating meta tags or HTML title
